Title: Slew of incentives for Haryana Police personnel
Content: Haryana Chief Minister Manohar Lal Khattar on Wednesday announced a slew of incentives for the welfare of police personnel, including increasing the ex-gratia amount to those who die or are seriously
Author: PTI
